data.author: lastfuture

changelog.release_notes: Squared 4.0 will now not vibrate for bluetooth disconnects during quiet time
This version adds the activity tracking options for Pebble 2 watches back into the config page

This huge update introduces battery level and step goal. Configure what you'd like to see in the bottom row instead of the date or what you'll see at a flick of your wrist.
Also memory usage has been improved and a couple of tiny cosmetic bugs have been fixed

This release adds localized weekday names. Just set your watch to one of the six languages.
A bug was also fixed, that sometimes showed a leading zero even if leading zeroes were turned off.
This update fixes an issue related to 12-hour format and Battery Saver

This version of Squared adds the Weekday as an option instead of the month.
It also adds a new color called "Quartz" which is an opalecent white. Check it out!
Bugfixes for black and white Pebbles

This update adds a bunch of new features:

Preview: See your watchface configuration directly on the type and color of watch you're currently wearing.

Battery Saver: Choose a time of night (or day) during which animations will not play to save battery.

Charging: Improve readability on your nightstand by enabling high contrast mode or always-on backlight for as long as your watch is plugged in.
This update adds vibration on bluetooth disconnect as an option and a preview of the watchface directly in the settings page
Improved performance when in developer mode by removing excessive logging of messages.
Added the option to center-align the date. Makes it look much nicer on round Pebbles
Fixed a bug that caused the settings page to crash some black and white Pebbles
Small Bugfix for black and white Pebbles
This is a huge making Squared ready for all Pebbles. Make sure to check out the settings page to customize your experience.

data.description:
A slick collection of squares showing you time and date. Customize colors and appearance.

Choose any color combination and preview the result right away.
You decide on the date format, if you want the weekday or leading zeroes.
See your step goal and your battery level ... or don't. Your call.
Enable features that are great for nightstand charging and battery saving.

Available for all Pebble smartwatches.

Initial release by lastfuture
Port to SDK 2 by jnm
Port to SDK 3 and colorization by hexahedria
continued development since SDK 3.8.2 by lastfuture

latest_release.release_notes: Squared 4.0 will now not vibrate for bluetooth disconnects during quiet time

data.title: Squared 4.0
